pkgmetadata.longdescription: Explainable Ensemble Trees // The Explainable Ensemble Trees 'e2tree' approach has been proposed by Aria et al. (2024) doi:10.1007/s00180-022-01312-6. It aims to explain and interpret decision tree ensemble models using a single tree- like structure. 'e2tree' is a new way of explaining an ensemble tree trained through 'randomForest' or 'xgboost' packages.
